item.description:
Small Business Tune-up: Thriving in a Tight Economy
with Vivienne Simon

When the economy changes, your clients' needs change. If you are a small business owner or solo entrepreneur and struggling with shrinking revenues, come learn this 6-part process for revitalizing your business by aligning with the current market.

Vivienne Simon, JD, CPCC, is a small business coach/consultant. She will explain the 6 steps involved. We will work on this together and get as far as we can in the meeting. You can then take the materials home and complete the planning process on your own.

There will be handouts.

Our meetings begin with a potluck lunch, and a chance to meet everyone in the group.
Please let us know what you'll bring to the potluck when you RSVP.

$10 meeting fee.
item.how_to_find_us: I will welcome them at the door
item.name: Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies July Meetup
